column1: Uchi////We sat with Chef Patrick (if you get a seat at the sushi bar - you in essence get a private chef
column2: which is unreal) and he was so much fun.  Personable
column5: creative and ONLY 20 YEARS OLD.  This guy has a bright future on the Houston culinary scene....trust me.  We told him we had no food allergies and were ready to have him take us on a trip of the menu
column6: with nothing but his favorites.  MAN
